items.strItemDescription: Upgrading requires a DA and Blacksmithing Skill of at least Rank 18. The darkness from this weapon seems to overflow..
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and Blacksmithing Level 18 or higher to create. You feel as if the darkness is crawling right into your veins!
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and Blacksmithing Level 18 or higher to create. You think your exposure to this much evil might be affecting you...
Upgrading requires a DA and Blacksmithing Skill of at least Rank 18. The darkness from this weapon seems to overflow..

Your very first sword! Maybe later you could learn to bronze it (or maybe not...)!
Your very first staff! Maybe later you could learn to bronze it (or maybe not...)!
Your very first dagger! Maybe later you could learn to bronze it (or maybe not...)!
A good effort, but the hit of the dagger has a rather large crack in it. Keep practicing! This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 7.
A good effort, but the staff is bowed in the middle. Keep practicing! This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 7.
A good effort, but the blade is split down the middle. Keep practicing! This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 7.
This is a simple design for a simple sword. It might cut a melon if you swing hard enough. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 9.
This is a simple design for a simple staff. No frills here. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 9.
This is a simple dagger design, for the beginner blacksmith who has just learned what a hammer is. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 9.
A beautiful and light-weight blade that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A beautiful and light-weight stave that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A beautiful and light-weight katar that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal. This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A beautiful and light-weight katar that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal.
A beautiful and light-weight stave that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal.

A beautiful and light-weight stave that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal.
A beautiful and light-weight blade that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal.
A beautiful and light-weight katar that you reforged from items found in the ruins of Sil. Made from zephyrite, a very rare wind metal.
This is a well balanced staff for a beginner mage. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 10.
This is a well weighted sword for a warrior who is just starting out. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 10.
This is a well weighted dagger. It's not elegant but it gets the job done. This item requires a Blacksmithing skill of Rank 10.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 12 or higher to create. It is an elegant weapon for a more civilized age.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 12 or higher to create. It is a great design for staff fighting as well as a magical focus.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 12 or higher to create. This well balanced dagger is dangerously sharp. It's maker needs the prudence to know when to use it and when not to.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 13 or higher to create. This is a very simple wand design for beginner wandsmiths.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 14 or higher to create.This sword design was originally taught to Yulgar by monks from the Temple of the Four Winds. It's design inspires fear and focuses strength.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 14 or higher to create. This staff design was taught to Yulgar by a man who claimed to have returned to the past, from a distant future.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 14 or higher to create. This dagger design is favored by the nomadic tribes of the deserts to the far south of Falconreach.
Upgrading requires a DA and Blacksmithing Skill of at least Rank 18. The darkness from this weapon seems to overflow..
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and Blacksmithing Level 18 or higher to create. You think your exposure to this much evil might be affecting you...
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and Blacksmithing Level 18 or higher to create. You feel as if the darkness is crawling right into your veins!
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Level 15 or higher to create.
DOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM! This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 15 or higher to create.
So much DOOM, it hurts! This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 15 or higher to create.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 16 or higher to create. This sword design is said to be the perfect blade for fighting ghosts and spirits.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 16 or higher to create. This staff's design makes it sturdy and reliable for even the most taxing magical task.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 16 or higher to create. This subtle dagger is a great design for keeping hidden in the folds of your robes or beneath your armor.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 18 or higher to create. This design was originally used by the blacksmiths of a demon hunting clan.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 18 or higher to create. This staff is often the type used by magi searching for something that they lost.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 18 or higher to create. The design of this blade is said to take it right to the heart of your enemy.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 20 or higher to create. This is a very defensive blade. It could easily double as a shield or surfboard.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 20 or higher to create. A very sturdy staff design for the mage who has run out of mana. In that situation, just start whacking your enemy with it.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 20 or higher to create. The design of this dagger is so complex in nature that half the blacksmiths who attempt to create it, go mad.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 22 or higher to create. This sword design has a wish for a bright and peaceful future inscribed into the hilt.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 22 or higher to create. The design of this staff is said to make the wielder appear thinner... something about vertical stripes.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 22 or higher to create. This dagger's design was found scrawled on a napkin in the World's End Inn.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 24 or higher to create. The smith's idea was to make a talking weapon, but instead of talking... it shouts.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 24 or higher to create. This staff design was made to honor the three sisters of the past, present and future.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 24 or higher to create. This blade's design is being researched, but it is still good in battle.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 25 or higher to create. The name says it all, this dagger adds 10 to your ability to make a critical strike against your enemy.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 26 or higher to create. This strange looking but strong sword design was made to honor the spirits of entropy and chaos.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 26 or higher to create. "There are other worlds than these"...and this staff design was found in one of 'em.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 26 or higher to create. This dagger design was taken from a dagger found in the bottom of an ancient mine, and what's mine is yours.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 28 or higher to create. This sword design was created by a honorable warrior who had retired.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 28 or higher to create. This staff design was traded to Yulgar by a traveling merchant in exchange for a new belt buckle.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 28 or higher to create. This type of dagger was originally designed for a prince, the praise was so high that the design was sold and made public.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 30 or higher to create. This blade will supposedly bring glory to any who wield it, but do you believe everything that you read?
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 30 or higher to create. This staff design is said to focus the mind's eye and sharpen it's sight to crystal clarity.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 30 or higher to create. This dagger moves silently, but causes alarm. The name is kind of self-explanatory.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 32 or higher to create. This sword design was created by the great blacksmith Murdok for his right-hand-man, who was actually a woman.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 32 or higher to create. "With a long enough lever, someone can move the world." This staff isn't long enough.

This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 32 or higher to create. This weapon was designed to move so silently that the only thing that your enemy will see is your smile before they fall.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 34 or higher to create. This weapon design was won by Yulgar in a card game.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 34 or higher to create. This staff is designed to go the distance in any fight, no matter how long.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 34 or higher to create. This dagger is said to bring good fortune to the entire bloodline of the one who crafts it.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 35 or higher to create. This sword's design came from a clan of dwarves who chose to live under hills instead of mountains.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 35 or higher to create. This staff design is said to focus the part of the mind where your memories are stored.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet and a Blacksmithing Skill of Rank 35 or higher to create. As the story goes, this dagger design was created while Death played the designer a tune to inspire him.
